title: CDC releases data that informed reconsideration of face masks, says delta variant of COVID means the ‘war has changed'
text:
Bipartisan infrastructure deal still faces long, uncertain road

While a bipartisan infrastructure plan is advancing in the Senate, analysts are warning that it remains on a bumpy road, with plenty of political maneuvering still ahead. See full story.

Interest rates haven't been this low in 5,000 years

How is this for a historical comparison -- interest rates are at a 5,000-year low. See full story.

Here's how the 6 Big Tech stocks now rank, from worst to first

How to judge Facebook, Amazon, Apple, Netflix, Microsoft and Google parent Alphabet now that they have reported earnings. See full story.

We want to retire to a fun lake house, but we also want city amenities. Our budget is $450,000. Where should we go?

This reader says humidity doesn't bother him and his wife, but they're not huge fans of snow. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

‘Had I received $10,000 out during his original refinancing eight years ago, that money would have grown either in savings or in the stock market.' See full story.
